```{r}
phase_diff_csv <- function(filename){
  
  df <- strsplit(filename, "/")[[1]][10]
  season <- strsplit(df, "_")[[1]][3]
  resp <- strsplit(df, "_")[[1]][2]
  driver <- sub(".csv","",strsplit(df, "_")[[1]][4])
  
  result <- 
    read.csv(filename) %>%
    select(c(date, NA_flag, pval_period1, Angle_raw)) %>% 
    mutate(day = as.Date(date), 
         Angle_raw_2 = ifelse(pval_period1 <= .1, Angle_raw, NA)) %>% 
    group_by(day) %>% 
    summarise(angle_raw_avg = mean(Angle_raw)) %>% 
    mutate(phase_hr = (angle_raw_avg*24)/(2*pi))
  
  result %>% 
    summarise(
      Phase_hr_avg = mean(phase_hr, na.rm = T),
      Phase_hr_sd = sd(phase_hr, na.rm = T)
      ) %>% 
    mutate(
      df = df,
      season = season,
      resp = resp,
      driver = driver
    ) 
}


ts_phase <- purrr::map_dfr(ts_files, phase_diff_csv)

```


```{r graph}

phase_diff_graph <- function(df, res, driver){
  
  df %>% 
  filter(resp == res) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(season, Phase_hr_avg)) +
  geom_point(size = 5) + 
  geom_errorbar(
    aes(season,
        ymin = Phase_hr_avg - Phase_hr_sd,
        ymax = Phase_hr_avg + Phase_hr_sd,
        ),
    lwd = 1.5, width = .2
  ) +
  geom_abline(slope = 0, intercept = 0) + 
  theme_classic() + 
  ylim(-10, 10) +
  ggtitle(paste(res, "vs", driver)) +
  ylab("Lead/Lag Hour") + 
  theme(
    axis.title.x = element_blank(),
    axis.text.x = element_text(size = 15),
    axis.title.y = element_text(size = 15),
    axis.text.y = element_text(size = 15),
    axis.ticks.x = element_blank(),
    panel.border = element_rect(colour = "black", fill = NA, linewidth = 1)
        )
}

phase_diff_graph(par_phase, "rRh", "PAR")
phase_diff_graph(par_phase, "rRa", "PAR")
phase_diff_graph(ts_phase, "Rh", "Ts")
phase_diff_graph(ts_phase, "Ra", "Ts")
phase_diff_graph(ts_phase, "PAR", "Ts")

    

```
